code_repairing_4:
'''
				manager.headPoseRelativeOffsetRotation = new Vector3(emulatedRoll, emulatedYaw, emulatedPitch);
'''

The original code was trying to create a new instance of Vector3 for manager.headPoseRelativeOffsetRotation in every frame. This is inefficient as the object will be disposed of and a new one allocated every frame. This is fixed by re-using the existing instance of Vector3.
